name: Round Concrete Reed Diffuser
description: Unlike the typical glass reed diffusers found everywhere, this unique handmade diffuser is made from portland cement and colored sand.To add to its unusual charm a recycled metal ring(beautifully rusted)sits on the rim. The concrete vessel will include wooden reeds and a small bottle of fragrance oil.

name: Southwest Style Concrete Vase
description:
The warm earth tones and texture of this Southwestern style vase could be mistaken for clay--but it is formed using portland cement,colored sand and stain. The extra added ingredient is crushed black glass that is layered throughout creating small crevices resembling sparkling geodes. The neck is embellished with smooth black stones recycled from an old bracelet. This piece can be used for dried flower arrangements, as a reed diffuser or as a stand-alone sculpture--you be the judge. 
Dimensions: 7.5 inches tall/ 5.5 inches wide

name: Concrete Cone Oil Lamp
description:
This unique cone-shaped oil lamp is created from portland cement,colored sand and concrete stain and is designed for indoor or outdoor use. This oil lamp would be equally at home on a fireplace mantel or a patio deck. The concrete cone sits on a metal stand(recycled and rusty--just the way I like it) and includes a chain wrapped around it's middle(also recycled and rusty)
Dimensions: 14 inches tall(with base) and 5 inches wide

name: Castle Wall Candle Holder
description:
This tealight holder was inspired the amazing rough textured walls of the English castles I have visited. There is a small niche in the wall to hold a tealight -or you can have whatever keepsake you would like there(perhaps a special memento from your travels)
This unique piece is created from portland cement, colored sand, and concrete stain with some crushed glass on the inside of the niche.
Dimensions: 9 inches tall/ 5 inches wide  
approx. 10 lbs (please try not to drop on your feet)

name: Concrete Incense Burner with Chained Lid***SOLD***
description:
This unique concrete bowl can be so many things, but it works great as an incense burner--just put an incense cone at the bottom of the bowl, put the cover on and watch and smell your favorite incense smoke wafting from the vent holes at the top. Great conversation piece. Handmade from portland cement, sand and concrete stain--truly one of a kind.  Can also be used as a small planter, or a place for special keepsakes.
Dimensions: 4.5 inches tall and 5 inches wide
